text: The 2012 Asia Cup was the 11th edition of the Asia Cup tournament. It was held in Bangladesh. Pakistan became the champion of this tournament as the host's Bangladesh became runner-up. It was the second time when Pakistan became champion of Asia Cup. On the other hand, in their history of Asia Cup Bangladesh qualified for the final first time. Category:2012 in Asia Category:2012 in sports Category:Cricket in Asia Category:2010s in Bangladesh
title: 2012 Asia Cup
